summary.p: The Top operator scans the input, returning only the first specified number of rows, possibly based on a sort order. The Tie Columns property can contain a list of the columns that are being checked for ties.
Top is a logical and physical operator.

tr.td: Specifies the limit of rows being returned by the Top operator.
Specifies whether the Top operator checks for ties. See TOP Clause for details.
Specifies which columns are checked for ties by the Top operator.
